properties.title: Säntispark Abtwil leisure and adventure centre
properties.abstract: With a variety of slides, swimming pools and a wide range of sports, the Säntispark in Abtwil is a paradise for families. If you prefer some peace and quiet, you can relax with a massage in the wellness area or visit the sauna.
properties.description:
Säntispark is a popular destination for water enthusiasts, and especially those who love slides: more than 1,000 metres of sliding fun is on offer with eight large slides. Are you after an adrenaline rush? You can achieve this by diving through the trap door: as this opens, you plunge down into the depths. The longest slide in Säntispark is the 180-metre-long ice canal. Three people slide along here in a tyre. The whitewater canyon also offers a special experience with its many twists and turns. 

The youngest visitors can have fun in the children’s pool world, where they can hunt for fish thanks to interactive light projections. Another highlight is the wave pool with surge zone and water fountain. 

There is a great deal to look forward to outside the pool zone as well: the wellness area promises relaxation with its large sauna area, private spa, Roman-Irish bath and a wide range of massages. There are also sports and games to experience without water: how about a round of mini golf, fitness training, a game of bowling or a squash competition? There is plenty for sports fans to enjoy at Säntispark too.
